user_request: Show the shopping cart on amazon. Add "macbook air" to the cart on amazon
screen_desc: The screen shows a smartphone's home screen with a pink gradient background. At the top, the date ("Wednesday, Nov 9"), the weather condition (cloudy), and the temperature (46°F) are displayed. Below, there are several app icons: YouTube, Messages, Gmail, Chrome, and Google Photos. A Google search bar is located at the bottom of the screen.

think_action.Thought: The user wants to access their shopping cart on Amazon and add a 'MacBook Air' to it. The current screen is the home screen of the phone, which doesn't show any Amazon-related apps or the cart. The next logical step is to open the Amazon app or navigate to the Amazon website through Chrome to access the shopping cart.
Future Action Plan: Open the Amazon app if it is installed on the device or open Chrome and navigate to Amazon.
Sign in to the user's Amazon account if not already signed in.
Navigate to the shopping cart and add the 'MacBook Air' to it.
think_action.Next Single Step Action: Open the Chrome app to access Amazon.
